MediaWiki Sessions
==================
This library provides a set of utilities for group MediaWiki user actions into sessions.  :class:`mwsessions.Sessionizer` and :func:`mwsessions.sessionize` can be used by python scripts to group activities into sessions or the command line `utilities <utilities.html>`_ can be used to operate directly on data files.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   sessionization
   utilities
